meanings.sent1: The unkindnesses of the bully made others feel sad.

meanings.definition: Acts or behaviors that are not considerate or compassionate.
meanings.sent1: The unkindnesses of the siblings towards each other caused tension in the house.
meanings.sent2: His unkindnesses at work made it difficult for others to trust him.
meanings.sent3: The unkindnesses of the toddler were more comical than hurtful.
meanings.sent4: The unkindnesses of time never seem to stop, always moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The unkindnesses of the traffic made the commute unbearable.
